name: Parent: Child Care App
description: Parent is a leading childcare solution that allows you to manage your child care center, streamline your administrative tasks while keeping parents connected to their children throughout the day.  Parent is an all in one application for everything you need: billing and invoicing, attendance tracking, events with automatic reminders, daily reports, detailed child profile, child development, photo and video sharing, unlimited document storage, and much more.   During this critical time, Parent team developed features to support e-learning, helping teachers and parents engage even while they are at home  - Activities Module:  An advanced feature during the e-learning era, to help the teachers evaluate the children while at home. Share activities with the parents, and monitor the submitted replies, all through the new activities tab.  - Newsfeed:  Newsfeed is an amazing tool for teachers to share videos with parents. Teachers can create a video of activity and directly share it with parents. Parents can then send an image or a video of their child carrying out the activity. Keep the parents engaged and help them by creating amazing and creative activities for their child to do at home.   - Calendar:  Teachers can schedule weekly calendar & daily tasks also can write a description on each days plan for more organized activities  - Documents:   Create folders and organize the material you want to share with parents. You can create a folder for each class or organize the content by age. Share the folders with parents from a specific class or the entire institute. Parents will have their own document center under their child profile and can access the material you share!  - Keep parents engaged:   Parents can send you pictures and videos of what their child is up to using the newsfeed comments or private messaging so you can keep them engaged and encourage them to carry out the activities you share with their child. Dont let the learning process stop.  - Media and Documents:  Parents and staff are able to send media and documents through our internal messaging system!
